text: Vin todi startuvav obstezhuyuchy yikhni konteynery, pered tym yak distavatysya do yoho konteyneru brata, ta vin vytyahnuv tse z yoho konteyneru brata. My takym chynom perfected skhema dlya Joseph; vin ne mih utrymaly yoho brata yakshcho vin zastosuvav zakon korolya. Ale shcho yavlyav soboyu bude BOHA. My exalt whomever my vybyrayemo vyshche vyshykuyetʹsya. Nahori kozhnyy knowledgeable, ye odyn khto ye navitʹ bilʹshe knowledgeable
